item.title: [+2100] Glenn Beck Agrees US Needs Another Terrorist Attack!
item.description: Glenn Beck agrees with guest that the US needs to be "saved" by another successful Osama bin Laden attack, to protect us from illegal immigrants. Has Beck finally gone too far?

item.title: [+2069] Michael Jackson Fans are Committing Suicide
item.description: According to Michael Jackson's largest online fan club, MJ fanatics have been recently committing suicide because of the pop star's tragic death. The Sun is reporting that up to 12 die-hard Jackson followers have taken their own lives since his passing on Thursday.

item.title: [+1942] Fast Food (made to look like) Fine Dining (Recipes and PICS)
item.description: These photographs show extreme makeovers of actual fast food items purchased at popular fast food restaurants. No additional ingredients have been added except for an occasional simple garnish.

item.title: [+1900] Cop Arrests A Woman, Punches & Violates Her For Carrying Pug
item.description: They took my pug and he told me he was taking him to the pound where he would be "put down." I was taken to the J stop headquarters. I wasn't allowed to call a lawyer and I was put in a cell with handcuffs on with two other women who spit on me and hit me in the head, because they weren't in handcuffs and I was crying so much it bothered them.

item.title: [+1677] Best First Page of Any Book Ever? [PIC]

item.description: This week, Zero Punctuation reviews The Sims 3.

item.title: [+1491] Fred Durst: Still A Douchebag, Just Older
[+1409] 'It Came from Wasilla' - McCain Staffers Trash Sarah Palin
item.description: "They can't quite believe that for two frantic months last fall, caught in a Bermuda Triangle of a campaign, they worked their tails off to try to elect as vice president of the United States someone who, by mid-October, they believed for certain was nowhere near ready for the job, and might never be."

item.title: [+1317] Robber Beaten By 72 Year-Old Ex-Boxer
item.description: THIS bungling burglar got a shock when he broke into a pensioner's home â€” two powerful right hooks to the face.

item.description: Youtube Commenters are running the Management

item.title: [+1212] First look: Firefox 3.5 released, ready to "upgrade" the Web
item.description: Mozilla has officially released Firefox 3.5, the next major version of its popular open source Web browser. Ars takes a close look at the new version and evaluates its enhancements. Support for HTML 5 video and other important emerging Web standards make this one of the most significant Firefox releases ever.

item.title: [+1057] Cat catches bat out of the air [Video]
item.description: Cat jumps straight up and juggles a bat to the ground. It ate every little piece of it.

item.title: [+1035] Anyone Can Help Me With My Boat?? [PIC]
[+994] Blizzard Responds to No LAN Support for Starcraft II Release
item.description: Starcraft 2 will have no LAN support and gamers are pissed. Why would Blizzard do this considering that people are still playing the original in a multi-player LAN setting over a decade after its release in 1998?

item.title: [+897] The American Dream: A Road to Riches [Infographic]
item.description: A New Look on Our Income vs. Our Debt Throughout our Better Years.
